name: Average Typist
description: This range includes 40-50% of all people. This certification ensures that you are typing as fast as the average person.

name: Certified Typist
description: This range includes 25-30% of people. At this level, you are faster than the majority but not yet at the professional level.

name: Proficient Typist
description: This range includes about 15-20% of people. You are well above average and typing at a proficient speed.

name: Advanced Typist
description: Only about 10-15% of typists achieve this level. You are entering the professional category.

name: Expert Typist
description: This level is reached by roughly 5-10% of typists. You are a high-level typist with exceptional speed.

name: Master Typist
description: Less than 5% of typists achieve this level. You are among the fastest typists in the world.

name: Elite Typist
description: Only 2-3% of typists can reach this level. You are a highly skilled typist, nearing the top of the field.

name: Distinguished Typist
description: Achieved by less than 1% of typists. You are among the elite in typing speed.

name: Virtuoso Typist
description: Only a small fraction of typists can hit this speed. You are in the top 0.1% of typists.
